response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value and the benefits it can bring to you, I propose a price of $14,000 for the product. This price not only reflects its true worth but also offers you a significant advantage compared to the market value. I look forward to hearing your response and the opportunity to discuss how this product can enhance your operations.", "product_price": 14000}
